title: Lesson 3
paragraph: Effort and resilience help individuals endure challenges. Persistent action and the ability to withstand obstacles are essential to recover and prevail in difficult circumstances.

words.example: She endured the long wait without complaint.

words.meaning: to continue firmly in spite of difficulty
words.example: He persisted until he solved the problem.
The building can withstand strong winds.

words.meaning: to face a challenge or problem directly
words.example: She confronted the issue with courage.

words.meaning: to deal with a problem effectively
to return to a normal state
to prove more powerful than opposing forces
words.example: Justice will prevail in the end.

words.meaning: to keep in good condition or continue
words.example: He maintained his position with dignity.

words.meaning: to support or keep going over time
words.example: The diet helped sustain her energy levels.
